name: Billionaire Brother Frill life
description:
The game begins with you as Billionaire brother with purchasing a Grand mansion for your family. A brand new limousine to enjoy the luxuries of life. Your high school boy needs his own ride. Take him out and buy him a brand new sports car. Arrange parties for your friends give them the taste of a billionaire life. Play the role of a caring husband and a loving brother. Entertain your friends and family with amazing luxuries and surprises. Playing this amazing brother simulator family game you will experience different roles like sister, brother and even your maid who gets to work in kitchen and other household tasks in this family home adventure game.


Features:
• Best 3D Family Game with your playing as Billionaire brother
• Real Family bother simulator home adventure
• Best Family Games for lovers of Luxury Life
• Be a real Billionaire bother in family game
• HD graphics & 3D animations with amazing interactivity
